0.0.1.name: wordpress/lc-tags
0.0.1.description:
LcTags is an editable flash template for wordpress tags. Tags come from the wordpress simple tags database, and allow administrator to edit display settings: - Color panel of tags - Buttons color and background color - Max and min size of words

Visitors can choose some settings when they visit the tagcloud - Tags space disposition (line, circle, 3d space) - Sort on date, popularity, alphabetic
